title: Linear Regression Channel
content:
The indicator displays a channel on the price chart with a width equal to the specified deviation, using Linear Regression Slope. This indicator is used to determine the direction and strength of a trend.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Calculation

NameDescription
Type Calculation Mode of the Indicator

Options:
  • Open
  • High
  • Low
  • Close
  • (High + Low)/2
  • (High + Low + Close)/3
  • (Open + High + Low + Close)/4
  • (High + Low + 2*Close)/4
Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Deviation Represents the amount by which the upper and lower bands deviate from the current price.

Visualization

NameDescription
Extend Lines Determines whether to extend lines.
Show fibonacci Determines whether to display Fibonacci lines.
Show broken channel Determines whether to display broken levels.
Bullish color Sets the color for elements with a bullish direction.
Bearish color Sets the color for elements with a bearish direction.
Broken channel color Specifies the color for this element.
Line width Determines the width of the displayed line.
Text Color Sets the color of the label text.
Text Size Determines the size of the text to be displayed.
Transparency This setting allows users to customize transparency of the visual objects on the chart.
